Immigrant farm workers are the backbone of our economy. They deserve dignity, respect, and a pathway to citizenship.

Proud to be the first of my Senate colleagues to join @UFWupdates/@UFWfoundation farm workers in the fields for a day. https://t.co/Z5tRLZEhME

Joined @VP for a roundtable discussion on reproductive freedom with faith leaders across CA as the rights afforded by Roe v. Wade hang in the balance.

Access to abortion is a fundamental right, and I appreciate the opportunity to partner with these advocates. https://t.co/DQkNf7O2Wy

In California, less than 3 affordable and available rental homes exist for every 10 low-income renters. We must take action to address this crisis.

That's why I support a robust, targeted housing investment in any budget reconciliation package. #Housing4All

They deserve a pathway to citizenship.

As a father, I‚Äôm honored to be named a #Champion4Children in the @Campaign4Kids scorecard.

These past few years have been difficult for all of us ‚Äî kids especially. Now more than ever, we must invest in a healthier and more sustainable future for our children. https://t.co/9cknwampm4

On this day in 1944, Allied troops bravely stormed the beaches at Normandy.

Today, we honor their courage and sacrifice to protect democracy and freedom around the world. #DDay

At least four more mass shootings took place in America in just the past 24 hours ‚Äî including six people killed in Philadelphia and Chattanooga. 

Words are not enough. We must take action now to save lives.

Yesterday, I experienced a small taste of the demanding work our farmworkers do to keep millions fed across America. Their work is essential to our success.

I won't stop fighting to enact robust immigration reform, & provide them with the pathway to citizenship they have earned. https://t.co/f8mu8lKBdP
Honored to work alongside @UFWPresident Teresa Romero and inspired by her tireless advocacy to improve the working conditions of farm workers. https://t.co/0hxBnFHoah

More than 18,000 people in the US have died from gun violence this year ‚Äî but it doesn‚Äôt have to be this way.

I #WearOrange for Uvalde, Buffalo, Laguna Woods, and countless other communities shattered by these tragedies. I won‚Äôt stop fighting to pass sensible gun safety laws. https://t.co/QZCEedrPRb

As I experienced firsthand, farm workers have one of the hardest jobs in America. They are the backbone of our economy.

I support the Farm Workforce Modernization Act, which would provide a pathway to citizenship for millions of undocumented immigrants who call America home. https://t.co/yRKNDUKvCH

Farm workers‚Äîand all immigrant essential workers ‚Äîdeserve respect, security & a path to citizenship.

That‚Äôs why I introduced the Citizenship for Essential Workers Act to provide a pathway to citizenship for immigrants who worked as essential workers during the COVID-19 pandemic. https://t.co/TaZuWupbwK

Migrant farm workers put food on our tables & kept grocery stores stocked throughout a global pandemic. Their work is essential.

Today, I'm joining workers with @UFWupdates and @ufwfoundation in the fields for a day in their boots. https://t.co/GPCSy7Utoy

Happy #Pride, California! https://t.co/U4kvKsx24d
